Package edu.yale.its.tp.cas.client.filter

Class Summary
CASFilter Protects web-accessible resources with CAS.
CASFilterRequestWrapper Wraps the HttpServletRequest object, replacing getRemoteUser() with a version that returns the current CAS logged-in user.
CASValidateFilter Validates tickets on requests for the filtered path.
ProxyChainScrutinizerFilter This Filter scrutinizes the proxy chain described in the CASReceipt session attribute exposed by the CASFilter.
SimpleCASAuthorizationFilter Filter protects resources such that only specified usernames, as authenticated with CAS, can access.
StaticCasReceiptCacherFilter Static filter class which caches CASReceipts, keyed by the tickets the validation of which the receipts represent.
